instructionsModal: The goal of Mastermind is to crack the secret code.
You do this by entering a guess that you think the secret code might be.
After each guess you will be given a decryption key to help you crack the code.
Each item in decryption key stands for one of the pegs in your guess.
it means that one of the pegs in your guess is both in the secret code and in the correct place.
means that the one of your guesses is in the code but is in the incorrect place.
After each guess you will learn more information about the secret code.
Using these keys, keep guessing until you have cracked the code.

settingsModal.showIcons: Show unique icons to distinguish colors on pegs
settingsModal.ownerText: A small game created by <2>Eoin O'Brien</2>.

keyboard.noDuplicates: Code does not include duplicate colors
